misc-unconventional-assign-operator.description:
Description

Finds declarations of assign operators with the wrong return and/or argument
types and definitions with good return type but wrong
return
statements.

The return type must be
Class&
.
The assignment may be from the class type by value, const lvalue
reference, non-const rvalue reference, or from a completely different
type (e.g.
int
).
Private and deleted operators are ignored.
The operator must always return
*this
.
misc-unconventional-assign-operator.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
